title: Binding champion mastery to Basic abilities
body: Is it allowed to do? A friend said that it was against terms and service because it's considered tampering with game code. Shrug. I'd like more than one person's input though

replies.body:
Making changes to your inputs outside of what's available in the in-game hotkeys settings is not advised not supported by us. You can try it, but it may break something. Technically modifying the game files is against the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), but we typically only take action against changes that offer a *competitive advantage*.

Let me know if you have any questions.
